caption.p:
(Bottom) A representative electron microscopy image of nCoV [22] with four virions, marked as 1–4, is shown with the spikes protruding from their envelopes. (1st row) Binary maps (thresholded images) of the virions 1–4. (2nd row) Log–log plot of box size versus number of boxes. The slope of the fitted straight line gives the D value, expressed as mean
±
standard deviation (SD). (3rd row) Radially averaged spectra for each image shown as a function of wavelength. Note the units of variables used are arbitrary.
